subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In explaining the Nets’ 13-12 slump, Joe Johnson said a lack of sticking to defensive plays has hurt them. Coach Avery Johnson pointed to a need for more trust among his players.
snippet: In explaining the Nets’ 13-12 slump, Joe Johnson said a lack of sticking to defensive plays has hurt them. Coach Avery Johnson pointed to a need for more trust among his players.
